title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: The steps continue up a gentle incline to the west.  The glazed steps are still perfectly smooth, a testament to their obviously magical creation.  A few humanoid skulls have been scattered along the steps, each staring up into the star-filled sky.
